recipe.title: Roasted Onions and Potatoes
ingredients: 2 pounds russet potatoes, scrubbed, cut into wedges
instructions: Preheat oven to 450°F. Combine all ingredients in large roasting pan. Toss well. Bake until potatoes are crisp and golden brown, stirring occasionally, about 1 hour 10 minutes. Season potatoes to taste with salt and pepper.
